alert.note: Alert for Latah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 12 at 3:25PM MDT until June 14 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Idaho, including the following county, Latah. * WHEN...Until 315 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Mud slides or debris flows in steep terrain are also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 223 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is possible in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Potlatch, Onaway and Viola. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
